name: 'Alien Invasion' - Game-A-Week 'Custom Theme' Experience Prototype
description: This is my VR game "Alien Invasion" as part of 'Custom Theme' Week for my Game-A-Week university project. The full theme was: 'An action game where you beat up thugs before the apocalypse.' Having issues throughout this week, this is unfinished to what was originally planned but can be understood as to the direction it was going.
